entry.content:

Before starting our review of all hostings for Magento we want to explain what is Magento.

What is Magento?

Basically, Magento is an eCommerce store building platform. Currently, this platform powers the websites of giants like Nike, Ford, and Coca-Cola.

There is one advantage of Magento that is insanely flexible and scalable. You can start with a small store and build it into a billion-dollar business without changing your platforms.

Do you know if you are running a Magento store with poor hosting is something like having a new Lambo with an old engine?

Unfortunately, for all its features Magento is a resource. That’s the reality of things. Only a top-level hosting provider will make this platform work better for your business.

In these below reviews, you can find out the info about the best hostings for Magento. Keep reading.

Scala Hosting provides automated Magento Updates but sometimes things are broken during the updates. So you should not opt-in for automatic updates.

In this hosting SEO tools are included for free so you can go on search engines without any issue and you can optimize your store for search results.

Their support can help you any time which is available 24/7 and do you know they are replying to your questions within a few minutes each time. Their knowledge base is very limited with no practical solution. You can get all your questions directly from their support.

entry.content:
Joomla is one of the most popular and secure CMS and there are quite a few hosts that support it. However, selecting the best Joomla hosts can be the biggest challenge for you. Many people love Joomla, but nobody wants to spend a couple of months shifting through bad web hosting providers.

For just save your time and money, we have analyzed a list of providers that claim to have a great platform for Joomla. So keep reading to find out which hosts can be better for you to host your Joomla website on it and which you should avoid.

Before starting the review and detail for every hosting we want to let you know about how we have evaluated the best Joomla Hosts:

Here are the steps we have followed for choosing our Joomla Hosting:

  1. Check reputation
  2. Go through the terms of service
  3. Check out hosting features
  4. Set up a Joomla website
  5. Test the support
  6. Check user reviews

So, Let’s begin with our list of best Joomla Website Hosting Providers:

Cloudways

Cloudways is a managed cloud services provider in terms of web hosting for PHP-Based CMSs like WordPress and Joomla.

Cloudways Performance

Cloudways performance is very hard to test. Cloudways lets you host apps on top public cloud providers like AWS, Digital Ocean, Google Cloud, Vultr, etc. Meanwhile, Cloudways offers professional management for Cloud servers. It’s extremely fast and high uptime. For e.g., Netflix hosted on AWS, and did you heard anything about Netflix was down or speed issues in Netflix? The answer is No.

This managed Joomla hosting adds PHP 7 support, Cloudflare CDN, and Memcached, Varnish, and Redis caching mechanisms. This lets you get excellent load times with some extra optimization.

Customer Support in Cloudways

Cloudways offers a solid support team that is available 24/7 for you with virtual servers. Their tech support takes care of various things like virtual machine management, backups, and server maintenance. You can contact them anytime if something is not working properly or if you need something like learning materials.

You can also get any application-level support for Joomla. Their support team can help you in troubleshooting themes and plugins and optimize the CMS Performance for you.

Cloudways Features

This hosting runs a smooth management panel. This enables you the things like SSL Installation, server scaling options, and automated backups. You can also setup a custom backup schedule.

You will also get a ton of other security features. This includes a specially configured firewall, auto-healing servers, IP Whitelisting, and more.

Cloudways lets you scale server resources up or down on the go. You have to pay for the resources by the hour, so you can always get the exact allocation you need.

These features make Cloudways one of the best Joomla hosts if you’re unsure how much resources you’ll need.

Cloudways is an excellent solution with unique advantages. You can get a flexible platform for your Joomla site.

Cloudways Pricing

Pros of Cloudways

  • Runs on excellent cloud infrastructures
  • Insane scalability and reliability
  • Excellent support
  • Optimized server stack
  • Pay-as-you-go pricing

Cons of Cloudways

  • Pricy for starting out
  • The proprietary CDN is paid extra

BlueHost

Bluehost is one of the popular web hosting service provider for CMSs. There is no way around it. It works for over 80 platforms which include Joomla too.

Performance of BlueHost

Bluehost has a 99.9% uptime guarantee. Most providers also offer this, so it’s easy to see the source of the mix-up.

While Bluehost says it resolves most downtime issues within 15 minutes, it offers no guarantee. This is strange as most of their competitors offer at least small compensation for excessive downtime.

Not to worry, though. Bluehost’s actual uptime falls around 99.95%. Bluehost doesn’t tailor speed optimization tools specifically to Joomla web hosting. However, its configuration makes Joomla run fast even without speed optimization tools.

Customer Support of BlueHost

Bluehost support team feel personal despite servicing over a million users. Their agents take their time to review your issues and to give you the best possible answer.

Bluehost has many CMS experts in its support team. They have many experts that understand Joomla better and are available to help users with any technical issues.

Unfortunately, the knowledge base offers a few Joomla guides. Instead, Bluehost always points you to Joomla.org for documentation. You can get some general Joomla help there.

Features of BlueHost

In BlueHost, you will get a one-click installer for Joomla with speed optimization and security. Joomla server stack also optimized for the best performance.

BlueHost also offers some very advanced account access features. It can be very helpful when you need multiple users to access the admin panel which is important for larger Joomla websites.

Some basic features you will get:

  1. 50 GB SSD Storage
  2. Unmetered Bandwidth
  3. Free SSL Certificate
  4. Standard Performance
  5. FREE Domain for 1 Year
  6. Automatic Daily Malware Scan
  7. Free Google Adwords credits

BlueHost Pricing

Pros of BlueHost

  • Lightning-fast platform
  • Awesome features

Cons of BlueHost

  • Costly website migrations
  • No Joomla guides in the knowledge base

SiteGround

SiteGround used to be Joomla’s demo hosting provider—meaning you could get a free Joomla site from it. Although this isn’t the case anymore, the hosting provider is still an avid Joomla supporter and one of its top contributors.

Here’s how its plans benefit Joomla users.

Performance of SiteGround

SiteGround offers a 99.9% Uptime guarantee, and if they can’t provide 99.9% uptime then they will offer you a month of free hosting.

Their infrastructure delivers 99.99% uptime. You can also expect a few minutes of downtime per month.

SiteGround is the fastest web server and their server response time is under 0.2 seconds this year. Their server stack is optimized for Joomla, so you can get impressive server response time and loading speed as well.

In terms of Overall performance, SiteGround is among the best Joomla Hosts.

Customer Support of SiteGround

The customer support of SiteGround is a highlight of this hosting which is available 24/7 and responds to all queries immediately. They offer live chat support in which waiting time doesn’t more than 10 minutes and it’s only for some time not always and also you can also call them via phone.

SiteGround also has a number of Joomla articles in its knowledge base.

Features of SiteGround

You will get all the basic features like SSD Storage, an SSL Certificate, Security features, and a control panel.

SiteGround leads to impressive performance. It provides a custom Joomla Caching solution. Their other custom solution is the jHackGuard Joomla extension which provides an additional layer of security against SQL Injection, remote code executions, and XSS-Based attacks.

If you want to use Joomla for e-commerce then go with the biggest plan. And in that plan, you will get the advantage of the PCI-Complaint server and all additional speed with security features.

entry.content:
Are you looking for best web hosting for your WordPress site? Here in this article we will help you to choose a better web host for your website.

We all know choosing the right hosting for your WordPress website is much important for your rankings and speed also. Your WordPress site’s health always relies on the hosting provider you use for your website.

But how you can choose a better WordPress host?

There are many web hosting providers to choose from like Bluehost, SiteGround, HostGator..etc.

There are three very important factors for WordPress hosting:

  • Speed: Load Time
  • Uptime: Uptime of any website server should be at least 99% because of the ranking of any WordPress website.
  • Customer Support: Customer support should answer your questions related to your WordPress website.

Usually, we can’t guarantee you will get similar uptime or speed for your website as this varies on different factors like your chosen hosting plan, your website size, and the number of visitors coming to your website.

Let’s start with the best hosting providers first then we will move down to the list to see which one you have to avoid or choose. Here are the top 10 web hostings for WordPress:

1. Bluehost (www.bluehost.com) 

  • Uptime: 99.98%
  • Load time: 553 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, knowledge base, phone
  • Features: One-click install for WordPress, free SSL, free domain for 1 year
  • Website: www.Bluehost.com

Bluehost is a very popular hosting service among many small business owners and bloggers who use WordPress for their website. The simple reason is- they have cheap prices starting from $2.75/month and it’s simple to use like one-click WordPress installation option and they usually don’t have any performance issues.

Also as we have used it for our WordPress websites and we have seen that this is the best cost/value ratio. Our uptime and speed monitoring tool Pingdom showed us an average uptime of our website is 99.98% and an average page loading speed of 554 ms for the last 10-months.

They are also one of the few web hosts that are officially being recommended by WordPress.org. As all of their plans come with free SSL, a WordPress staging environment and a very easy WordPress install feature.

And also Bluehost doesn’t offer a free site migration service with its lowest plan and it will cost you about $500 for transferring anyone site. If you will purchase their plus plan or above then you will get this feature for free for one website.

Bluehost has a very large database for WordPress tutorials and all plans come with 24/7 live support which is very fast and reliable.

Bluehost Pricing

Pricing of Bluehost starts at $2.75/month (with 3 years plan) and they provide a free domain with SSL for a year. Their renewal price is $7.99/month. Bluehost also comes with a one-month money-back guarantee.

Pros of Bluehost:

Strong uptime and load time, free custom domain name and recommended by WordPress.org.

Cons of Bluehost:

No option to pay monthly, no free migration for a website with the lowest plan.

2. HostGator Managed WordPress (www.HostGator.com)

  • Uptime: 99.97%
  • Load time: 284 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, knowledge base, phone
  • Features: Free site transfer and backups. WordPress optimized servers, unlimited bandwidth
  • Website: www.HostGator.com

HostGator hosts almost 15 million domains over the world making them one of the most popular web hosting service providers on the market. Similarly the Bluehost, HostGator also offers WordPress hosting solutions.

HostGator was the best option for high traffic websites which needs to be good at loading speed. HostGator WordPress plan can also make your website faster across different regions and for mobile users.

All of their plans have unlimited bandwidth, storage, free email accounts, and a free site migration feature.

You can also reach their support any time via phone or live chat and believe us their customer support is very helpful and fast.

HostGator Pricing

Their pricing starting from $5.97/month if you will go with 3 years plan and their renewal price are higher at $9.95/month. Even HostGator offers a 45 days money-back guarantee.

Pros of HostGator

The good Loading speed of the websites, reliable and one-click install WordPress with 1 free site migration option.

Cons of HostGator:

Its renewal price is very high.

3. Hostinger (www.Hostinger.com)

  • Uptime: 99.96%
  • Load time: 308 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, knowledge base
  • Features: Free email account, unlimited bandwidth, free SSL
  • Website: www.Hostinger.com

Hostinger is the hosting service provider from Europe but has data centers in the USA, Asia, and Europe. They don’t have any option to choose the data center but once you are signed up you can ask them to change your data centers from the USA to Asia or Europe.

They also have a WordPress builder which is not very ideal but it can help in the beginning a lot. Hostinger also offers 24/7 live chat support which is very helpful and they also have the largest library of WordPress guides.

Hostinger Pricing

Their pricing for WordPress starts from $2.15/Month if you choose 4 years time period and it will renew at $3.49/Month. This plan also includes unlimited bandwidth and 20GB disc space with 1 email account as well as an SSL Certificate and free site migration option.

Pros of Hostinger

  • Cheap Price
  • One-Click WordPress install
  • Fast Speed
  • Free Site Migration

Cons of Hostinger

  • Very Limited Disc Space for all of their plan.

  • Load time: 643 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat
  • Features: Google cloud servers, free https (SSL), free email, free site migration
  • Website: www.SiteGround.com 

SiteGround is also the most popular WordPress hosting service provider and recommended by Wordpress.org itself. From 2004, SiteGround started and growing as a large network of about 800,000 domain names and hosts those around the world.

They are in the list of few hosts who provide you an option to change your data center locations from Europe to the USA, the USA to Europe. So if your visitors are mainly from the USA only it’s a better option for you.

Also, they offer WordPress site migration for free which also includes a free CDN and image optimization service which makes your WordPress website faster than before.

Their Customer support was also very friendly and helpful and they answer your questions too quickly with very less waiting time to connect with their support via live chat and you can also call them directly but waiting time in call support is longer than live chat support and you will get a good experience with their support team.

  • Fast Speed
  • Recommended by Woocommerce and WordPress.org
  • Free SSL

Cons of SiteGround

Also,

According to performance tests, A2 Hosting was 2nd most fastest shared WordPress hosting provider at 303 ms. A2 Hosting’s average uptime has been 99.98% with 2 hours of downtime per year.

A2 Hosting Pricing

Their pricing starts from $2.99/month for minimum registration of 3 years and it will be renewed at $8.99/month. You can also get free unlimited email accounts and website migrations and 100GB of disc space. If you own many WordPress websites then A2 Hosting was the better convenient host for you.

One plus point is A2 Offers any time money-back guarantee.

Pros of A2 Hosting

  • Fast hosting for WordPress.
  • Optimized servers for WordPress
  • Free Site Migration
  • Anytime Money back guarantee.

Cons of A2 Hosting

Renewal prices are too high.

6. GreenGeeks (www.GreenGeeks.com)

  • Uptime: 99.95%
  • Load time: 434 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, phone, knowledge base
  • Features: Unlimited storage & bandwidth, automatic updates, free SSL
  • Website: www.GreenGeeks.com

If you are looking for fast, secure, and scalable Web Hosting Providers for WordPress then GreenGeeks is suitable for you. Their name itself means that they have been implementing any environment-friendly approach to hosting websites.

All of the plans of GreenGeeks include free SSL, free CDN, unlimited email accounts, unlimited bandwidth, free WordPress site transfer, and unlimited storage. They offer three data centers which are the USA, Europe, and Canada. And when you sign up, you have an option to choose your data center or server location.

If we look for support from GreenGeeks, then they provide support from Live Chat, email, and phone support as well as WordPress related tutorials and guides.

In terms of performance, they are providing a speed of 434ms which is good, and reliable uptime of 99.95%.

GreenGeeks Pricing

Their plans start from $2.95/month which renews at $9.95/month. They provide a 30-days money-back guarantee but if you have taken a free domain offer then they will deduct $13.95 for a domain name registration fee.

Pros of GreenGeeks

  • Good speed
  • Green hosting provider
  • Free SSL
  • Free site migration

Cons of GreenGeeks

  • High Renewal Cost

7. InMotion (www.InMotionHosting.com)

  • Uptime: 99.92%
  • Load time: 598 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, phone, knowledge base
  • Features: WordPress is pre-installed, unlimited bandwidth, unlimited email accounts
  • Website: www.InMotionHosting.com

InMotion hosting is also the most popular WordPress hosting service provider which is US-based and with more than 350,000 domain names over the world.

There are many reasons which make InMotion a good fit for WordPress users. Every plan comes with free SSL, CDN, unlimited email accounts, and more than 200 free WordPress themes. They provide a limited number of sites to be hosted and disk space for all of those.

They provide fast and reliable 24/7 live chat and phone support based in the US. In addition to these, free WordPress transfer and they have their own BoldGrid pre-installed website builder which makes you build your website itself.

Uptime and speed of InMotion Hosting are average, but enough. They have 99.92% uptime and an average speed of 598 ms for the last 12 months as we have noticed.

InMotion Pricing

They have various WordPress plans which start from $4.99/month with a 3-year contract and it renews at $7.99/month that may vary from websites, storage, and bandwidth. They also provide dedicated WordPress solutions. Also, they offer a 90- days money-back guarantee.

Pros of InMotion

  • Reliable
  • Fast
  • Good customer support

Cons of InMotion

  • No instant activation for people outside the US.
  • Uptime is average.

8. Site5 (www.Site5.com)

  • Uptime: 99.99%
  • Load time: 556 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, email, knowledge base
  • Features: free site transfer, One-click install for WordPress, unlimited disk space, and bandwidth.
  • Website: www.Site5.com

Site5 is not that much cheaper shared WordPress hosting provider but they claim to be the best option for developers as they offer a flexible control panel, good customer support, and stable hosting.

Similarly to others, Site5 also offers free Cloudflare CDN, 27/7 live chat support and site transfers. They provide 99.9% uptime guarantee. But you can’t choose data centers and default server location is set to the USA (Central).

It is not as fast as Hostinger or A2 Hosting but beats in uptime.

Site5 Pricing

Site5 is also expensive like Siteground. Their plans cost starting from $6.95/month for 2 years and it renews at a higher cost of $8.95/month. Site5 comes with a 45-days money-back guarantee.

Pros of Site5

  • Great Uptime
  • Average Speed

Cons of Site5

  • High cost
  • No-option to choose data centers

  • Load time: 894 ms
  • Support: knowledge base, limited live chat
  • Features: WordPress is pre-installed, drag and drop builder, unlimited bandwidth/storage
  • Website: www.DreamHost.com

All of their plans (Shared WordPress, Managed WordPress, and VPS) offer free WordPress website builder, free SSL and SSD Storage and Unlimited Bandwidth so your website can’t be slowed down when your visitors increase to your website.

They don't offer free site transfers, it costs $99 but they provide this for free when you select a plan of $16.95/month and they also do not offer a 24/7 support option. They have live chat support, but it is only available from 5:30AM to 9:30 PM Pacific time but at least it's 7 days a week.

They are also not an ideal host for a website that servers visitors outside the USA or Asia. And their uptime is only 99.63% with an page loading speed of 894 ms. You can’t select server locations outside the USA.

DreamHost Pricing

Their plans start from $2.59/month with 3-year commitment or $4.95/month. DreamHost also has high performance managed WordPress hosting plans which are more expensive than others which costs $16.95/month. Their email accounts cost $19.99/year and free domain for a year which also renews at $15.99/year. DreamHosts gives a 97-days money-back guarantee.

Pros of DreamHost

  • Good Loading speed
  • Average Uptime
  • Free SSL
  • Free WordPress website builder

Cons of DreamHost

  • Too Costly
  • Email accounts are not free
  • Renewal cost also high
  • No option to choose data centers outside the USA.
  • Limited Live Chat option

  • Load time: 799 ms
  • Support: 24/7 live chat, phone, knowledge base
  • Features: Free domain, unlimited storage & bandwidth, free SSL

Are you looking for a review of Leadpages vs ClickFunnels? Not sure whether to choose ClickFunnels or Leadpages?

Above are very hard questions but now you have come to the right place. In this review, we are taking a depth look at both of these marketing tools to help you which one is right for yours. In the world of marketing, there is no such thing as a “one size fits for all” tool. You can come into this review learning towards one but then you realize that the other one fits better.

We will look at both tools individually and then compare them together in a head to head match.

But before we discuss the tools let me explain the difference between a landing page and a funnel.

What is a Landing Page?

A landing page can be a page of your website that a new visitor lands first on that page. By definition, if we go then a landing page can be an email opt-in page, a sales page, your website’s homepage, a blog post, a product listing, or any other page on which you want to drive traffic.

In marketing, your goal is to create optimized landing pages for first-time visitors on your welcome page and help them to learn about your product or services. You may not make sales but you can collect email subscribers by offering lead forms or free ebooks or an email course.

What is Funnel?

The goal of your funnel may not be purchasing a product but it may be subscribing to your mailing list or signing up for a free trial. The ultimate goal is to make a sale but that is not mean that every funnel has to lead a sell.

You may also have several types of funnels on your site like:

  1. One that nurtures leads.
  2. One that upsells your customers.
  3. One that converts leads into your customers.

Sales funnels are just a series of conversion-optimized pages.

What is ClickFunnels?

ClickFunnels is a marketing software that can help you to create conversion-optimized pages to use in your sales funnels. ClickFunnels was developed by Russell Brunson who was an Internet marketer, the best selling author, and also the founder of DotCom Secrets.

How does it work?

ClickFunnels allows you to create sales funnels and landing pages both. You can also run an email marketing service, track and also manage affiliates and even you can operate a membership website with ClickFunnels.

For using ClickFunnels you don’t need to be a web designer or developer to create web pages. With its share funnels feature, you don’t even need to be a good marketer to create a successful sales funnel.

For details of every feature offered by ClickFunnels, you can read from our previous article.

Below are the features which make ClickFunnels such an outstanding marketing service.

Create Sales Funnels

Create a funnel for your goal using ClickFunnels. To do this you can select funnels from a library of pre-built funnels or create your own funnel from scratch.

Create a Landing Page

You can use this as a page editor to create your entire website if you would like. ClickFunnels can let you create landing pages up to 100 with the standard plan and up to 300 with the Elite plan.

Host your landing pages on ClickFunnels

You can host your landing pages on ClickFunnels without any issue with any plan you subscribed to.

Get a custom domain

You can register a new domain from ClickFunnel at an affordable cost.

Use ClickFunnels with WordPress

You can use ClickFunnels with WordPress by using ClickFunnels WordPress plugin with which you can easily integrate.

Share your funnels with others

You can share your funnels with others also with ClickFunnels sharing feature.

Nurture leads with the built-in email autoresponder

You can nurture your leads with the built-in email autoresponder without going to another email marketing tool software or service.

Perform split testing

With ClickFunnels, you can do split testing of various versions of your landing pages after creating variations of your landing pages with some changes.

ClickFunnels Support & Community

For supporting customers, ClickFunnels had done their job well. After signing up, you can start with six pre-built funnels.

And if you need any help, you can find a ton of resources in the help center. In the help center, you can find topics related to start creating with ClickFunnels to integrating third-party tools, everything in detail how you can do a start and creating funnels for your marketing.

And if you can’t find your answer in the help center articles then you can simply click the live chat to send a message to the support team and someone will get back to you within an hour. Also, you can reach ClickFunnels over Facebook also.

Pricing offered by ClickFunnels

The base plan starts with $97 per month in which you will get 14 days free trial to test all the features, and if you will pay for one year in advance you will get a free two-month subscription.

The second plan, known as Etison Elite, which is the full suite of services offered by ClickFunnels.

What is Leadpages?

Leadpages is a landing page builder with various marketing features for marketers. You can use this tool to create an optimized sales page from where you can collect and manage contacts for your marketing efforts.

Leadpages is more than just a landing page builder. With leadpages, you can use Leadboxes to create pop-up opt-in forms that can be placed on any page of your website. You can also generate leads via email with Leadlinks. Finally, Leaddigits allows you to get subscribers or contacts via text message also.

How does it work?

Leadpages is perfect for beginners who are just looking for a simple tool that is also budget-friendly. With the use of Leadpages, you will get a very intuitive experience. Even if you have never created landing pages before you will also feel confident using Leadpages on your first try.

Pricing offered by Leadpages

Also, you can choose a month to month billing for standard and Pro plan. The advanced plan requires an annual or two-year payment upfront. You will save quite a bit more if you will pay for annual and especially for a two-year service in which pricing is cut off in half as compared to monthly billing.

In this plan, you have to pay $17 per month when you purchase two years upfront, $25 per month when you will purchase annually, and $37 for a month to month plan. Month to month is still in your budget if you will get such great features inside in comparison with ClickFunnels.

ClickFunnels Vs. Leadpages

There a various factors that I personally believe most people will look at price and ease of use.

So, which should you choose?

But if you are still not confirmed about which one to use then you should try 14 days free trial of ClickFunnels and test all features. If you find that is not good for your business then cancel and check out Leadpages. I am about 90% sure that ClickFunnels will do everything you want.

entry.summary: Introduction To UnbounceWith the help of Unbounce, you can create and design…
entry.content:
Introduction To Unbounce

With the help of Unbounce, you can create and design beautiful Landing pages that will convert leads for you with their pre-built landing page templates, and more features are built it to make sure your website visitors converted into your customers.

They have features like:

  1. Build Any Page on Your Own
  2. Create the Exact Page You Want
  3. Continually Grow Your ROI
  4. Popups builder
  5. Landing page builder

With Unbounce, you can create custom landing pages without a piece of coding knowledge. Also, you can get the highest converting campaigns possible with Unbounce Conversion intelligence and latest AI Feature and smart traffic.

As we all know websites are great for information and exploration, Unbounce can turn your website’s traffic into revenue, how we will discuss here. With Unbounce, you can create and optimize your dedicated landing pages that focus your visitors on one goal instead of bouncing them back from the distractions.

With an easy drag and drop landing page and popup builder and also with the help of 100+ landing page templates, you can easily bring any of your campaign vision to life in just a fraction of the time it will take with a developer.

And also design pages that look and act almost 100% the way you want to create. You can put any looks and functionality you want with the customizable templates with optional Javascripts and CSS for both mobile and desktop versions.

With Unbounce, get a built-in AI Conversion power with smart traffic and A/B Tester for your landing pages to see what’s exactly working. You can experiment with messaging, designs, and forms to validate what makes more visitors can convert.

Why did we start using Unbounce?

It all comes down to the time it takes to design and develop new pages. Basically, landing pages were useful when we need to promote new products and any services.

You often need multiple landing pages at any one time and also for different products or websites, PPC campaigns, and email marketing campaigns.

With Unbounce, you can give your marketing team the power to create landing pages quickly and the key is Unbounce. It’s easy and quick.

Your first landing page design never gets the best results but practice and experiments do with A/B testings.

To maximize the performance of your landing pages you need to optimize and test on an ongoing basis and this simply means you should create multiple variations for every landing page you build.

You should know that Unbounce comes with unlimited A/B Testing on all of its plans and you can use it for your landing pages built-in A/B Testing tool and you can do enough with the use of a single platform.

Also, Unbounce comes with a unique feature which is Dynamic Text replacement which can make personalization fast and easy to implement.

Unbounce is a conversion-driven platform

There are various types of landing page builders into the market but one of the things about Unbounce is that it is a purely conversion-driven platform. The whole point of creating landing pages is to convert the visitor into your customers or leads and paying customers.

As I have already mentioned that Unbounce comes with unlimited A/B Testing which is a very useful tool for optimizing conversions with landing page variation experiments. But it also comes with Built-in tools designed only to capture more leads which includes popups, sticky bars, and AI Optimization features.

Unbounce Pros & Cons

In my point of view, Unbounce is a great software and there are various good things to say about it. There is always a need improvement in many cases as we have pointed all pros and cons we have experienced while using the platform.

Unbounce Pros

  1. You can build and publish landing pages very quickly.
  2. You can easily create variants for testing.
  3. Excellent templates and various third party sources for more templates.
  4. Highly Customizable.
  5. Awesome Landing page builder.
  6. Split testing functions are very good.

Unbounce Cons

  1. Form builder of Unbounce lacks some key features.
  2. You can’t do a split test for your existing landing pages created outside of Unbounce.
  3. You can’t add custom classes to buttons in Unbounce which prevents tracking goals.

If Unbounce let you do split test the landing pages built outside the Unbounce then this would be a great win and the ability to add custom classes to buttons can save a lot of time as well.

But overall, Unbounce can save you more time than it costs and once you are running with this platform then you can do things easily. The landing page builder is great and the templates available are excellent and you can also get the freedom to customize your landing pages.

Also, I must include the split testing feature which is solid and too sure that they are not extensive as a dedicated piece of A/B testing software but it is a strong offering for a landing page builder and also you can get more features than most of the alternatives.

Unbounce features: More than a landing page builder

As I have already explained above that Unbounce is a landing page builder primarily so the platform offers a set of features beyond its builder and many of these are very important when it comes to create and optimize landing pages like A/B Testing.

Here is the list of features offered by Unbounce:

  1. Landing pages
  2. Popups & sticky bars
  3. A/B testing
  4. Reports & analytics
  5. Dynamic Text Replacement
  6. Smart Traffic
  7. AMP landing pages
  8. Lead form builder

Let us explain every feature:

Landing Pages Builder of UnBounce:

With Unbounce Drag and drop, landing page builder can make sure anyone anytime can pick up the tool and start creating pages without any coding knowledge or using any designing software.

You can choose from a lot of templates to get started and customize them to meet your needs easily and quickly. Also to speed up the design process, you can clone and edit the entire pages, copy and paste them and save your own templates for next time.

Features of landing page builder are:

  1. Drag-and-drop builder
  2. 100+ templates
  3. Clone & edit
  4. Copy and paste
  5. Full control
  6. Quick publishing

Popups and Sticky Bars

After landing page builder, Unbounce also comes with its own sticky bar and popups builder which can be used for boosting conversions so there is no denying that they can increase your conversion rates when used effectively.

Features of Popups and sticky bar builder are:

  1. Drag-and-drop builder
  2. Templates
  3. Targeting & triggers
  4. Schedule
  5. A/B testing

A/B testing from Unbounce

Unbounce provides various A/B Testing features on all of its plans which allows you to optimize your landing pages and popups for maximum performance.

You can set up A/B Testing campaigns within some clicks to test entirely different pages, variations like the same page with or without a lead form or specific elements like call to action feature etc.

Report & Analytics

This software provides insights into how your landing pages are performing and how your A/B Tests are going. You can access all of this in the dashboard but you will get the best results with the integration of Google Analytics.

You can easily find the documentation on how to integrate Google Analytics with Unbounce but all you really need to do is get tracking id from Google Analytics to enter into Script Manager, which you can find under settings.

Dynamic Text Replacement

This feature helps in landing page personalisation. The feature matches the copy of the landing page based on the keywords typed by the users before clicking on your ads.

To set up your dynamic text replacement in Unbounce, you can simply select the text you want to apply it to and then click the dynamic text button.

Smart Traffic

Smart traffic is an AI based conversion tool that automatically looks at each visitor's attributes and directs them to the most relevant pages. The algorithm looks at attributes like user location and their device to determine which variations of landing pages will be more effective than others.

Features of Smart Traffic Tool:

  1. AI optimisation
  2. Automated CRO
  3. Fast results

AMP landing pages

Unbounce was only the first landing page builder which supports AMP landing pages. Accelerated Mobile pages are just designed to make the web pages faster for mobile users specially which increases loading speed to an average of just a second.

  1. Create AMP landing pages
  2. AMP templates
  3. Up-to-date

Unbounce makes it easy to create and test and optimise AMP landing pages in the same way you can do with any other page builder platform.

Lead Form Builder

This builder also comes with its own form builder which allows you to add lead generation forms to any pages. And also this feature included in a landing page builder.

You will get better results from a form builder and optimization tool that operates. And this is the area where you really need a specialist toll to maximise conversions. It also helps in integration of Leadformly with unbounce so you can embed your forms on landing pages and also any other web page outside of Unbounce.

How much does Unbounce cost?

Unbounce has three core plans and you can get access to most of its features across all of them.

  1. Essential: $79/month
  2. Premium: $159/month
  3. Enterprise: $399+/month

As you can see here, pricing starts from $79 per month and the difference is how many landing pages and popups you can create. Even on the essential plan you will get a limit of 75 landing pages and eight popups or sticky bars, which will be all needed by all some smaller businesses.

Also, the essential plan doesn’t support AMP landing pages or some of the more advanced targeting settings. There are some features reserved for the enterprise plan such as audit logs, dedicated support and also page migration.

Final Words

Unbounce is a great tool for building landing pages to promote your products and increase the conversion rates many times and also there is various features you will never see in other platforms as Unbounce itself mainly a landing page builder so we can’t say it is bad, above review written by using and experienced about its features itself.

Introduction to ClickFunels

Clickfunnels provides you tools and strategies at one place to help your business grow with promotions and landing pages. 

With the help of ClickFunnels, you can build awesome landing pages, quick sales funnels that convert customers for you, Smart Shopping carts in just 1 click, email marketing, and Facebook marketing automation at the same place.

With ClickFunnels, you can generate new leads that you can connect with, and also create simple funnels that capture your visitor’s contact information and their messages so that you can generate new leads to follow-up with again and again also after they leave your web page.

If you are in touch with the world of digital marketing, you should have at least heard about ClickFunnels, the landing page builder that was helping online sales funnels. In this review, we will take you deep into the Pros and Cons to ClickFunnels if it is legitimate business marketing software or not.

Clickfunnels has created itself as a pretty big name since it started, as it was one of the largest marketing software as a services company. I think it is no surprise why people love Clickfunnels as it is all about making money for its users. More specifically, it’s about giving business software that helps them to turn their website’s visitors into customers and then conversions. There is no wonder ClickFunnels has grown so much and all-time higher in the list of landing page builders and marketing software in such a short period of time.

In this review, we will go through the gist of Clickfunnels like what it is, the positives and the negatives, the features, customer service, and more. I am making this review on the basis of my own experience using ClickFunnels’ startup plan which itself includes coreClickFunnels features and other special and unique features.

ClickFunnels Review Highlights

Here is a list of ClickFunnels’ review highlights on which we are going to know more in this review:

  1. ClickFunnels is a nice landing page builder, with an easy drag and drop editor.
  2. Very Easy and various integrations that allow you to capture emails and take payments inside the ClickFunnels.
  3. Built with A/B Testing capabilities.
  4. Easy to learn and use.
  5. Focused on making its users more money.
  6. They offer a free trial of two weeks.

What is ClickFunnels?

Clickfunnels started in 2014, but in just 3 years it’s been in the words of Forbes, “silently revolutionizing the online marketing industry.” With ClickFunnels, it makes you easier for businesses and entrepreneurs to sell online using this with the ease of complicated marketing technology, which is called sales funnels.

Clickfunnels Founded by Russell Brunson who is as famous as his creation, and for a good reason. He’s made a fortune not just only for ClickFunnels, but other marketing adventures. He played around with email marketing and eventually began to master sales funnels.

ClickFunnels started out as a way to help Brunson and his team to create funnels more quickly for different ventures as usually, it takes over a week or more to develop funnels. So they realized their creation can be useful to others and then they have launched ClickFunnels as its name means just click and make your funnels it works also in just some steps only.

What Are Funnels? How Sales Funnels Work?

In digital marketing, it is a process that can take people who don’t know you and convert them as your customers, which is known as a marketing funnel. In e-commerce, sales funnel is a series of steps designed to guide visitors to the checkout page.

Step1: Imagine a funnel.
Step2: Imagine this funnel will be helpful for your website visitors.

Your site visitors are looking around by checking things out. And with a sales funnel you can get your website visitors to the right place for what they actually want to purchase.

ClickFunnels is created to save your time and energy like if you want to create funnels for yourself and develop it for yourself then it requires a lot of technological proficiency and also maybe some other third-party applications, so it this respect ClickFunnels Succeeds.

What ClickFunnels can do for you?

Pros of ClickFunnels

Makes you money

One of the best things about ClickFunnels is its focus on making money for its users. They make it very easy to use and make your account and put your content and start taking payments. But maybe it can take some hours to figure out most of what you need.

Drag and Drop Page Builder

There are very few features that are very useful here. I really like how easy it is to duplicate pages and the fact is I can save templates to use them later again. Their page builder is a very important feature, and they have pulled it off. When you get used to it, it is an easy to use drag and drop page builder.

A/B Testing

With ClickFunnels you will get a free A/B testing tool which is great itself to test your landing pages on various platforms also. All you need to do is duplicate a page and make your changes and choose the traffic you want to see version A or B.

Various Selection of Integrations

ClickFunnels handles API Integrations well. Email and payment processors are not too good but they are working reliably and are easier to manage.

WordPress Integration Plugin

You will also get a WordPress plugin that can let you add ClickFunnels pages to your WordPress website and use it for your marketing. It saves a lot of time and is less than working between ClickFunnels and WordPress without a plugin. The ClickFunnels WordPress Plugin is also rated about 4.4 stars in WordPress Plugin store and has about 20k active installations.

All in one

From ClickFunnels you can build your landing pages, create various forms and order forms, and send marketing emails all from one platform. All of this really does save your time and money, various resources you would otherwise need to spend on many developers, CSS, hosting configurations, and more.

Reasonable Value

If you have more than 20000 visitors and need over 100 pages then ClickFunnels Platinum might not be too much.

ClickFunnels is not perfect but it does a great job of packaging great tools together and making them accessible.

Cons of ClickFunnels

I have some bad news, not much but still, there are few areas that need to work on ClickFunnels. Our review can’t be completed without looking at the ugly side as well.

Overpriced?

A very small drawback is the price. There are only three pricing options like $97/month, $297/month, and $2,497/month. In this tool, this is not a big deal just another investment in your business, and as I have said above you will get a good package for it.

Customer Service

Customer support is good but in my experience, they have been fine with a basic question but if you will ask them more difficult things especially about more advanced features they can’t be very helpful.

Too Templates

This one is not on ClickFunnels but more on the community. While you have the ability to customize with ClickFunnels, many people use similar designs. By considering the popularity of ClickFunnels, this has to be a large amount of ClickFunnels looks good.

Bugs

ClickFunnels will go down or experience some errors. This doesn’t happen any time but it does. If you are investing a lot in advertising and driving traffic to your funnels and a ClickFunnels glitch brings your pages down for even a few hours you can lose a lot of money.

ClickFunnels Pricing – How much is Clickfunnels?

ClickFunnels have two plans which are ClickFunnels Standard Plan and their ClickFunnels Platinum Plan. ClickFunnels is $97 per month and Platinum comes in at $297 per month. And if you want to try all its features you will get a 14 days free trial to try their services, so at the end you don’t need to commit to an expensive plan. If you will pay annually instead of monthly then you will get two months free in $997 for ClickFunnels and $2997 for platinum plan.

If you will compare ClickFunnels with LeadPages, a similar service which starts at $25 per month but it is important to keep in mind about ClickFunnels main service is to create funnels for you with more efficiency and it does a good job in this. I can consider it a good investment.

The main difference between an entry level account and a premium account are :

The standard plan gets the main service the funnel builder with various limitations on the amount of pages, visits and custom domains which is only 3 and only some of the full list features.

But both the plans have unlimited contacts, unlimited members can be added and all the advanced funnels, A/B Split tests and a few other features which can be helpful to create your own  sales funnels.

What is FunnelFlix?

ClickFunnels Founder, originally made a lot of his money by selling information products and online courses. It seems that ClickFunnels is trying to launch the NetFlix model with FunnelFlix but with online courses, in my opinion is confusing when you are just trying to use the software for marketing services. There is some good content but it is just too much.

Features Overview of ClickFunnels

Here’s the full list of StartUp features:

  1. 20 funnels
  2. 100 pages
  3. 20,000 visitors
  4. unlimited contacts
  5. 3 custom domains
  6. A/B split tests
  7. Email integrations
  8. Optin funnels
  9. ClickPops
  10. ClickOptin
  11. All advanced funnels
  12. Sales funnels
  13. Membership funnels
  14. Unlimited members
  15. Auto webinar funnels
  16. Hangout funnels
  17. Order pages

  20. Share your funnels
  21. 1 SMTP integration
  22. 1 billing integration per type

ClickFunnels Page Builder

We can say this is the main feature of ClickFunnels, so I would like to devote special attention to it. ClickFunnels have a solid landing page builder. ClickFunnels distances itself from page building software and advertises its funnel creating software but its landing page builder is also very easy to use and it includes various elements which can convert customers for you easily.

You can also save various templates and make personal page templates and it's very easy to find them, as you can see toggle with basic settings and you can open them in the editor.

Once you will open your pages in the editor, you will basically now go to work with a drag and drop builder. It is complicated but not more than other page builders but still it can be easier to use.
